query: select negPressure1, negPressure2, topTemperature1, topTemperature2 from FluidBoilerBody where uid='bfeca85b-36fe-43d5-aa8c-ec957a1dd68a'

select temperature1 as flueOutlet_temp1, temperature2 as flueOutlet_temp2, pressure1 as flueOutlet_pre1, pressure2 as flueOutlet_pre2 from FluePipeSection where uid='38a0c5f8-7a36-4166-9c0b-3e918f3215b1'
select airFlow as left_wind_current from AirPipe where uid='ac7882d7-ff5b-4b21-af2e-b467f17a2422'
select airFlow as right_wind_current from AirPipe where uid='87611717-7f11-471a-906a-4bcd73292179'
